title: Operation Zero Tolerance - 1997 X-Men Crossover (Marvel)
description:
Operation: Zero Tolerance was a crossover storyline that ran through MarvelÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s X-Men related titles during 1997. The story followed from the Onslaught Saga where Magneto's mind and Charles Xavier's subconsciousÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ merge and create the entity known as Onslaught.  Most of the core non-mutant superhero teams (the Fantastic Four, a number of the Avengers and Bruce Banner), along with Doctor Doom sacrificed themselves in order to help destroy Onslaught. 

This led to a great amount of distrust being harbored toward all mutantkind.  Graydon Creed, a presidential candidate and outspoken proponent of mutant hatred, was assassinated by what was meant to look like an energy blast of some kind. This escalated humanity's festering feelings toward mutants.

The fallout of both of these events served as a springboard for the man known as Bastion to suggest to the government that in order to keep the nation safe from the growing mutant threat, they capture and exterminate all mutants.  Bastion, along with the aid of his newly constructed Prime Sentinels, was given approval to implement this plan, which was dubbed "Operation: Zero Tolerance". 

The main storyline was in the issues listed below, but I have included further issues that build upon and conclude the story.
